mapper.update:
UPDATE brand
name = #{name},
chinese_name = #{chineseName},
english_name = #{englishName},
alias = #{alias},
log_url = #{logUrl},
ownedcompany_chinese_name = #{ownedcompanyChineseName},
ownedcompany_english_name = #{ownedcompanyEnglishName},
introduction = #{introduction},
platform_id = #{platformId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
